method: Cook the bow tie pasta according to package instructions.
Rinse the cooked pasta with cold water to cool it down.
In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, whipped cream, and sweetened condensed milk.
Crush the Oreo cookies and fold them into the pasta mixture.
Pour the chocolate syrup over the dessert and gently stir to swirl it through.
Refrigerate the bow tie Oreo dessert for at least 2 hours to allow it to set.
Serve chilled as a delicious and unexpected sweet treat.
